Title: Nhân Viên Tuân Thủ - Đăng Kiểm Sản Phẩm
Company: Công Ty TNHH Ô Tô Isuzu Việt Nam
Location: 695 Quang Trung, Phường 8, Quận Gò Vấp, TP HCM, 695 Quang Trung, Thong Tay Hoi Ward, HCMC
Job Description:
Phòng ban: Homologation
Mục đích công việc: Đảm bảo các sản phẩm và quy trình của công ty tuân thủ nghiêm ngặt các quy định pháp luật và quy chuẩn/ tiêu chuẩn kỹ thuật hiện hành liên quan đến phê duyệt kiểu loại. Vị trí này đóng vai trò quan trọng trong việc nghiên cứu chuyên sâu các quy định, phân tích tác động và hỗ trợ các phòng ban nội bộ trong việc hiểu và áp dụng hiệu quả các yêu cầu tuân thủ.
Trách nhiệm chính:
1. Nghiên cứu & Phân tích Quy định (Regulatory Research & Analysis):
o Thực hiện nghiên cứu, theo dõi và cập nhật liên tục các văn bản luật, quy định, quy chuẩn/ tiêu chuẩn kỹ thuật mới và sửa đổi liên quan đến phê duyệt kiểu loại từ các cơ quan quản lý nhà nước như Cục Đăng kiểm Việt Nam, Bộ Giao Thông Vận Tải (nay là Bộ Xây Dựng) cũng như các tiêu chuẩn quốc tế (Châu Âu - ECE, Đông Nam Á - ASEAN).
o Phân tích và giải thích chi tiết các yêu cầu quy định mới, đánh giá tác động cụ thể của chúng đối với thiết kế, sản xuất và quy trình phê duyệt của sản phẩm hiện tại và tương lai.
o Tổng hợp thông tin quy định thành các báo cáo hoặc tài liệu dễ hiểu cho nội bộ.
2. Hỗ trợ Tư vấn & Triển khai Nội bộ (Internal Advisory & Implementation Support):
o Đóng vai trò là điểm liên hệ chính (Window PIC) để các phòng ban nội bộ (R&D, Kỹ thuật, Sản xuất, Kinh doanh) tìm kiếm thông tin và tư vấn về các yêu cầu tuân thủ phê duyệt kiểu loại.
o Hỗ trợ Trưởng nhóm trong việc cung cấp hướng dẫn, giải đáp thắc mắc và phối hợp với các bên liên quan để tích hợp các yêu cầu tuân thủ vào quá trình phát triển sản phẩm ngay từ giai đoạn thiết kế ban đầu đến sản xuất hàng loạt.
o Tham gia vào việc xem xét sơ bộ các tài liệu kỹ thuật, thông số sản phẩm và thiết kế để đảm bảo phù hợp với quy định.
3. Quản lý Dữ liệu & Hồ sơ Tuân thủ (Compliance Data & Dossier Management):
o Hỗ trợ xây dựng, duy trì và cập nhật các bảng kiểm tra tuân thủ chi tiết cho từng dự án hoặc từng loại sản phẩm.
o Thực hiện việc thu thập, sắp xếp, số hóa và quản lý các tài liệu, báo cáo thử nghiệm, và dữ liệu liên quan đến tuân thủ theo quy định nội bộ và bên ngoài.
o Đảm bảo tính chính xác, đầy đủ và dễ truy xuất của thông tin trong cơ sở dữ liệu tuân thủ.
o Hỗ trợ theo dõi và quản lý hiệu lực của các chứng chỉ phê duyệt kiểu loại, phối hợp với nhóm Type Approval để đảm bảo việc gia hạn được thực hiện kịp thời.
4. Hỗ trợ Quản lý Rủi ro & Cải tiến Quy trình (Risk Management Support & Process Improvement):
o Hỗ trợ Trưởng nhóm trong việc nhận diện và đánh giá các rủi ro tuân thủ tiềm ẩn liên quan đến thay đổi quy định, thiết kế sản phẩm hoặc quy trình sản xuất.
o Đóng góp vào việc đề xuất và triển khai các biện pháp phòng ngừa hoặc khắc phục rủi ro đã xác định.
o Tham gia vào các hoạt động cải tiến quy trình làm việc nội bộ của nhóm Compliance nhằm nâng cao hiệu quả và tính tự động hóa.
5. Báo cáo & Phối hợp (Reporting & Coordination):
o Hỗ trợ chuẩn bị các báo cáo định kỳ về tình hình tuân thủ quy định, tiến độ các nhiệm vụ của nhóm Compliance và các vấn đề phát sinh.
o Cập nhật thông tin và dữ liệu vào các hệ thống báo cáo nội bộ và chuẩn bị dữ liệu cho các báo cáo lên cấp quản lý.
o Phối hợp chặt chẽ với Nhóm Type Approval để đảm bảo thông tin tuân thủ được chuyển giao liền mạch cho quá trình thực thi phê duyệt.
Job Requirements:
• Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Kỹ thuật Ô tô, Cơ khí, Điện tử, Luật hoặc các ngành kỹ thuật/pháp lý liên quan.
• Có ít nhất 2-3 năm kinh nghiệm thực tế trong lĩnh vực homologation, tuân thủ quy định, kỹ thuật sản phẩm hoặc các vị trí tương đương, ưu tiên trong ngành sản xuất ô tô/xe máy/thiết bị vận tải.
• Có kiến thức vững chắc và kinh nghiệm áp dụng các quy định, tiêu chuẩn kỹ thuật liên quan đến phê duyệt kiểu loại tại Việt Nam (ví dụ: các Thông tư, Quy chuẩn của Bộ Giao thông Vận tải (nay là Bộ Xây Dựng), Cục Đăng kiểm Việt Nam).
• Ưu tiên ứng viên có hiểu biết về các tiêu chuẩn quốc tế như ECE (kinh nghiệm về VAMA tech issue là một lợi thế).
• Kỹ năng nghiên cứu, phân tích thông tin phức tạp và giải quyết vấn đề tốt.
• Kỹ năng giao tiếp bằng văn bản và lời nói tốt, khả năng trình bày thông tin kỹ thuật/pháp lý một cách rõ ràng và súc tích.
• Có khả năng làm việc độc lập với trách nhiệm cao và làm việc nhóm hiệu quả.
• Thành thạo tiếng Anh (đặc biệt là đọc hiểu tài liệu kỹ thuật, pháp lý và giao tiếp chuyên ngành).
• Thành thạo tin học văn phòng (MS Office: Word, Excel, PowerPoint; ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm với các hệ thống quản lý tài liệu/dữ liệu).
Phẩm chất cá nhân:
• Cẩn thận, tỉ mỉ, có tư duy logic và chú trọng chi tiết.
• Trung thực, có đạo đức nghề nghiệp và tinh thần trách nhiệm cao.
• Năng động, chủ động học hỏi và sẵn sàng cập nhật kiến thức mới trong một lĩnh vực thay đổi liên tục.
Keyword: Công Ty TNHH Ô Tô Isuzu Việt Nam

Title: Gấp!!! Nhân Viên Kiểm Tra Chất Lượng (Inspection Staff/ Không Yêu Cầu Kinh Nghiệm)
Location: Khu CN Thăng Long 2, xã Nguyễn Văn Linh, phường Dương Hào, tỉnh Hưng Yên, Khu CN Thăng Long 2, xã Nguyễn Văn Linh, tỉnh Hưng Yên
Job Description:
We are NIKKISO VIETNAM, INC, a 100% Japanese Invested Manufacturing Company. Our Factory is located in Thang Long Industrial Park II, Nguyen Van Linh Commune, Hung Yen province. Our products are airplane components manufactured with specialized technology.

We are welcome the potential candidate for filling the position of Inspection Staff.

Job description.

- The inspection staff will be responsible for quality activities, as well as additional tasks in the Inspection department, based on the instructions of management.
- Control hygiene, safety, 5S in factory.
- Be responsible for productivity and quality improvement.
- Be responsible for process and product improvement.
- Other tasks/issues if having requirements from direct management.
Job Requirements:
Job Requirement

- University graduation.
- Good at communication in English is a must.
- Can read drawings and use Autocad well would be an advantage.
- At least 1 years experience in the same position in Manufacturing Company would be an advantage.
- Having high skill on planning, reporting and management
- Good at Computer and Knowledge in Statistic.
- Good teamwork abitities, working independently and can work under high pressure.

Benefit:

- Competitive package shall be given to the right candidate.
- Company will arrange commune bus from Ha Noi, Hung Yen and Hai Duong.
- Language allowance, Childcare allowance, Petrol allowance and housing allowance,...
- Join social insurance, health insurance and unemployment insurance according to the provisions of law
- Work 268 days/ year, off at least 4 Sundays and 2 Saturdays/ month
- Join sport activities, year-end party, lucky draws and other events organized by the company
- Workmen insurance 24/24 for all employees.
- Opportunity to go on business trips abroad, especially to Japan, and interact with companies within the global Nikkiso network.
- Annual awards and recognition for outstanding individuals.

Title: Operations Team Leader (Japanese Language)
Location: Flemington Tower, 182 Le Dai Hanh, Quang Trung Software Park, District 12
Job Description:
Essential Functions/Core Responsibilities
• Responsible for the day-to-day supervision of a group of call center associates including work and attendance monitoring in accordance with organization policy and applicable legal requirements
• Effectively coach direct reports on their performance on a regular basis to ensure performance metrics are achieved at a minimum weekly
• Identify performance related issues, develop an action plan for improvement, implement corrective action, up to and including termination of employment
• Ensure service delivered to our customers meets contractual Key Performance Indicator (‘KPIs’) and financial expectations
• Communicate expectations to employees and provide timely updates
• Provide subject matter expertise in handling escalated customer calls as needed
• Conduct Team Meetings to ensure expedient communication of relevant information and as an open forum for input. Schedule and organize team activities
• Stay current on internal work processes, policies and procedures. Attend required manager development training
• Promote the Concentrix values through both behavior and attitude, including being an advocate for team members
• Manage the employment status of call center associates and participate in the transfer, promotions or regularization of call center associates, which is necessary before any such employee-movement is made
• Exercises independent judgment and discretion in the performance of the said main function as a means to implement management policies
• Exercises authority to manage the employment status of a group of employees (firing, promotion, regularization, etc.) including identifying and addressing misconduct, policy and process violations of call center associates
• Stay current on internal work processes, management policies and procedures and ensures implementation of the same Implement management policies
• Support and manage the program together with other Team Leaders and Managers
• Providing input into selecting, training, developing, and completing performance appraisal of work group(s) in accordance with the organization’s policies and applicable legal requirements

• The Team Leader’s role is a managerial level position, a position reposed with trust and confidence.

• Japanese 4 skills (N2 certification is required)

Job description

Title: Chuyên Viên Pháp Lý Dự Án BĐS
Location: Khu Đô Thị Tân Tây Đô, Tân Lập, Đan Phượng, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
• Cập nhật và phân tích các quy định liên quan đến đầu tư, xây dựng, đất đai, nhà ở, môi trường và các văn bản pháp luật khác; tư vấn rủi ro và giải pháp pháp lý cho dự án.
• Phối hợp thực hiện hồ sơ pháp lý với các cơ quan nhà nước (xin chủ trương đầu tư, giao đất, cấp phép xây dựng, hoàn công…); theo dõi tiến độ và xử lý vướng mắc.
• Trực tiếp soạn thảo và kiểm tra các hợp đồng, văn bản pháp lý (mua bán, xây dựng, tư vấn, liên doanh...) đảm bảo chặt chẽ, đúng luật và bảo vệ quyền lợi công ty.
• Hỗ trợ đàm phán, giải quyết tranh chấp phát sinh với khách hàng, nhà thầu, đối tác hoặc cơ quan nhà nước.
• Lưu trữ hồ sơ pháp lý dự án đầy đủ theo quy định.
• Hỗ trợ công tác phát triển dự án các công việc có liên quan.
• Thực hiện công tác báo cáo, thống kê định kỳ hoặc theo yêu cầu của Quản lý trực tiếp.
• Công việc khác theo phân công.
Job Requirements:
• Bằng cấp: Tốt nghiệp Đại Học Chuyên ngành Luật. Ưu tiên ứng viên có chứng chỉ hành nghề Luật sư hoặc các chứng chỉ pháp lý chuyên sau liên quan đến bất động sản, XâY dựng.
• Kinh nghiệm: Tối thiếu 03-5 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc ở vị trí tương đương.
• Nắm vững các quy định của pháp luật về Đầu tư, Xây dựng, Kinh doanh bất động sản, Nhà ở, Đất đai…đặc biệt là về trình tự thủ tục Đầu tư xây dựng dự án.
• Kỹ năng phân tích, tổng hợp, tư duy pháp lý sắc bén, khả năng đánh giá rủi ro, logic rõ ràng.
• Xử lý tình huống tốt, nhanh nhạy.
• Giao tiếp, thuyết trình tốt.
• Có khả năng làm việc độc lập cao.

Title: Nhân Viên Marketing Quay Chụp Dựng Hình Ảnh Video
Location: Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam, 56 Quang Trung, Tăng Nhơn Phú B, quận 9, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
Job Description:
- Thực hiện biên tập, quay và dựng các video nấu ăn ngắn phục vụ truyền thông đa nền tảng (Reels, TikTok, video giới thiệu sản phẩm, video hướng dẫn...).
- Lên kế hoạch và phối hợp với các bộ phận liên quan để đảm bảo chất lượng hình ảnh và âm thanh tốt nhất.
- Hợp tác chặt chẽ với team Marketing để phát triển concept video cho các chiến dịch hàng tháng/quý và tối ưu hóa hiển thị video trên các nền tảng khác nhau.
- Sử dụng các thiết bị quay phim, chụp ảnh chuyên nghiệp và phần mềm hỗ trợ để tối ưu công việc.
- Chụp và chỉnh sửa hình ảnh sản phẩm cơ bản khi cần thiết, đảm bảo đồng bộ hình ảnh với các nội dung video.
- Quản lý và lưu trữ có hệ thống các file video, hình ảnh và tư liệu media phục vụ sản xuất nội dung.
- Đảm bảo toàn bộ sản phẩm media tuân thủ nhận diện thương hiệu trên mọi nền tảng truyền thông và được hoàn thiện đúng thời hạn, theo tiêu chuẩn của Công ty.
Job Requirements:
- Từ 1–2 năm kinh nghiệm làm thiết kế, quay dựng video, ưu tiên trong lĩnh vực ưu tiên ngành FMCG, F&B, Spa làm đẹp.
- Thành thạo các phần mềm: Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, Premiere/ CapCut, After Affect là lợi thế.
- Có thẩm mỹ tốt, khả năng sáng tạo, tỉ mỉ và bắt trend nhanh.
- Có tinh thần học hỏi, chủ động, đúng deadline và phối hợp teamwork hiệu quả.
Field: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm

Title: Giám đốc đào tạo
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Tổng Công Ty Nova Service
Location: 65 Đường Nguyễn Du, Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 65 Nguyễn Du, Bến Nghé, Quận 1
Job Description:
1. Hoạch định và phát triển chiến lược, chính sách và chương trình Tổ chức Đào tạo phù hợp với chiến lược NSG và các công ty thành viên
• Phân tích nhu cầu và xây dựng kế hoạch đào tạo ngắn hạn, dài hạn theo từng giai đoạn, phù hợp với chiến lược kinh doanh của Tập đoàn.
• Xây dựng khung chương trình, ngân sách đào tạo tổng thể và đào tạo theo chức danh.
• Phát triển đa dạng chương trình, thiết kế tài liệu, phương pháp đào tạo nội bộ phù hợp với từng đơn vị và văn hoá Tập đoàn.
• Xây dựng các chính sách và quy trình đào tạo phù hợp, hiệu quả.
• Phối hợp với đơn vị nội bộ và đối tác bên ngoài trong việc thiết kế và triển khai chương trình đào tạo.

2. Quản lý và điều hành hiệu quả hoạt động Tổ chức Đào tạo
• Giám sát, đánh giá kết quả triển khai các chương trình đào tạo; đánh giá chất lượng giảng viên.
• Quản lý ngân sách đào tạo, đảm bảo sử dụng hiệu quả nguồn lực được duyệt.
• Quản lý hệ thống tài liệu đào tạo, hồ sơ, báo cáo theo quy chuẩn.
• Đảm bảo tổ chức các chương trình đào tạo đúng tiến độ, kế hoạch.

3. Phát triển đội ngũ và triển khai hệ thống đào tạo trực tuyến
• Xây dựng và phát triển đội ngũ giảng viên nội bộ, nhân sự kế nhiệm và nhân tài.
• Triển khai hệ thống đào tạo trực tuyến (E-learning), tích hợp công cụ đánh giá năng lực, khảo sát mức độ hiểu biết theo vị trí.
• Quản lý, vận hành hiệu quả hệ thống đào tạo trực tuyến, đảm bảo nâng cao năng lực học tập.


4. Đảm bảo chất lượng và đo lường hiệu quả Tổ chức Đào tạo
• Đánh giá tác động của chương trình đào tạo đến năng suất, hiệu suất làm việc của người học.
• Phối hợp thu thập phản hồi, khảo sát sự hài lòng sau đào tạo, đưa ra đề xuất cải tiến.
• Đo lường mức độ áp dụng kiến thức, kỹ năng vào công việc thực tế.

5. Xây dựng và duy trì sự tuân thủ công tác quản trị, vận hành hệ thống.
• Chủ trì xây dựng hệ thống quản trị nội bộ Ban/Phòng: Quy định, Quy trình, Biểu mẫu, Quy chế triển khai (Checklist) công việc,… đề xuất điều chỉnh Ma trận phân quyền phù hợp vận hành từng thời kỳ để đảm bảo công tác vận hành nội bộ, phối hợp công việc liên Ban/Phòng được xuyên suốt, chính xác, nhanh chóng mang lại hiệu quả tối ưu.
• Xây dựng và triển khai kế hoạch Tổ chức Đào tạo chuyên môn nội bộ cho Ban/Phòng nhằm nâng cao năng lực chuyên môn, phát triển đội ngũ nhân sự kế thừa.
• Tuân thủ nội quy/quy định/tài liệu nội bộ của Tổng Công ty. Quản lý dữ liệu/ thông tin/ hồ sơ chuyên môn và các tài liệu liên quan đến tác nghiệp nội bộ Ban/Phòng. Đồng bộ hóa dữ liệu hướng đến số hóa và AI hóa toàn bộ hệ thống quản trị nghiệp vụ chuyên môn.
• Nhận diện, đánh giá, kiểm soát và giảm thiểu các rủi ro phát sinh trong hoạt động hàng ngày tại Đơn vị; báo cáo tới Phòng Quản lý Rủi ro, Quy trình và Tuân thủ các rủi ro phát sinh theo các chính sách, quy định nội bộ về quản lý rủi ro.
• Quản trị, chịu trách nhiệm về các vấn đề liên quan đến công cụ dụng cụ, tài sản mà Ban/Phòng sử dụng, vận hành, quản lý.

6. Thực hiện các công việc do quản lý phân công ngoài JD, kế hoạch
Job Requirements:
- Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Quản trị Nhân lực/ Kinh tế/ Quản trị Kinh doanh/ Luật,… hoặc các chuyên ngành khác có liên quan
- Am hiểu chuyên môn huấn luyện, Tổ chức Đào tạo, phát triển con người
- Nắm bắt được xu hướng mới trong lĩnh vực Tổ chức Đào tạo và phát triển con người
- Trên 10 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực Đào tạo, trong đó có ít nhất 5 năm ở vị trí tương đương ở các công ty/tập đoàn trên 1000 nhân sự

Các yêu cầu khác
- Hiệu quả, Chính trực, Chuyên nghiệp
- Năng động, sáng tạo, nhạy bén; Chịu được áp lực cao trong công việc;
- Có tư duy chiến lược, hoạch định và phân tích tốt;
- Khả năng quan sát, phán đoán, phân tích, tổng hợp.
Level: Giám Đốc và Cấp Cao Hơn
Skills: Kỹ năng quan sát và phân tích vấn đề

Title: Chuyên Viên Kinh Doanh B2B Ngành Gỗ/ Nội Thất Thu Nhập Hấp Dẫn Không Giới Hạn
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Tập Đoàn Gỗ Minh Long
Location: Toà Nhà 319 Bộ Quốc Phòng, Đường Lê Văn Lương, Trung Hoà, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Khu công nghiệp Bắc VINH, Đặng Thai Mai, xã Hưng Đông, Nghi Lộc, Nghệ An, Việt Nam, số 51 Đường 36, Khu nhà ở Đông Nam, P.Hiệp Bình Phước, TP.Thủ Đức, Tầng 20, toà nhà 319 BQP, 63 Lê Văn Lương, Q.Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội.
Job Description:
1) Tìm kiếm, xây dựng và phát triển mối quan hệ khách hàng
- Chủ động tìm kiếm, khảo sát và khai thác trên thị trường các văn phòng kiến trúc, tư vấn thiết kế, nhà thầu, xưởng nội thất, thi công nội thất… nhằm tìm hiểu thông tin, chủ động tiếp cận để giới thiệu sản phẩm, dịch vụ và khả năng hợp tác.
- Chủ động liên hệ qua điện thoại, email, Facebook, Zalo,.... để đặt lịch gặp gỡ, giới thiệu sản phẩm – dịch vụ.
- Tư vấn & chào hàng: tư vấn demo mẫu mã, giải pháp gỗ công nghiệp, gửi báo giá và tài liệu kỹ thuật.
- Tham gia xây dựng chính sách hợp tác để các Công ty tư vấn thiết kế/ Kiến trúc sư đưa thương hiệu Gỗ Minh Long vào hồ sơ/Bản vẽ/Dự toán.
- Thường xuyên thăm hỏi, cập nhật thông tin về sản phẩm, xu hướng ngành, thu thập phản hồi để cải tiến dịch vụ.
- Tham gia sự kiện, workshop kiến trúc, nội thất, triển lãm: Thuyết trình/giới thiệu về sản phẩm, thương hiệu tại các event, seminar, hội nghị … nhằm giới thiệu thương hiệu Minh Long, mở rộng network

2) Xây dựng hình ảnh thương hiệu
- Luôn giữ phong thái chuyên nghiệp, thông điệp đồng nhất khi làm việc với khách hàng
- Hub & lan tỏa hình ảnh Minh Long: gửi Catalogue, mẫu vật liệu, tài liệu kỹ thuật; chia sẻ case study thực tế, chứng minh lợi thế thị trường.
- Phối hợp giải quyết khiếu nại của khách hàng (nếu có)
Job Requirements:
- Tốt Nghiệp Trung cấp, Cao đẳng, Đại học các chuyên ngành tương ứng...
- Trên 2 năm kinh nghiệm về Sales, Bán hàng, Phát triển thị trường, chăm sóc khách hàng,…
- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với khách hàng B2B trong ngành vật liệu nội thất, kiến trúc, xây dựng, gỗ, Vật Liệu Xây Dựng, ngành Gỗ công nghiệp là lợi thế.
- Ứng viên có kinh nghiệm đi thị trường, chủ động tìm kiếm khách hàng mới và chăm sóc khách hàng
- Am hiểu về tâm lý khách hàng. Kỹ năng tư vấn & đàm phán tốt; kỹ năng lập kế hoạch & quản lý thời gian; kỹ năng phân tích thị trường & báo cáo, kỹ năng xây dựng mối quan hệ với khách hàng tốt
- Tinh thần trách nhiệm, kiên trì, trung thực và cầu tiến.

Title: CAD Drafter
Location: 204/27 NGUYEN VAN HUONG STREET, AN KHANH WARD, HO CHI MINH CITY, Vietnam, Australia, China, Hongkong
Job Description:
Responsibilities:
• Create detailed CAD drawings for window and door systems, ensuring accuracy and adherence to specifications.
• Collaborate with the quoting team to provide precise and timely quotes for clients.
• Assist in the development and maintenance of CAD libraries and drawing standards.
• Liaise with the fabrication and extrusion experts to ensure the feasibility and quality of designs.
• Engage with clients and the sales team to discuss and resolve technical inquiries and issues.
• Support the engineering team in developing new glazing systems and products.

Compensation:
Competitive salary with annual reviews.
5 weeks of leave per year: 2 standard weeks, 3 flexible weeks to be taken as holiday or converted into extra pay.
Annual health check for staffs.
Annual company trip for team building and relaxation.
Premium health insurance package
Annual salary review based on performance
Comprehensive training provided on drawing door and window systems.

Title: Senior Staff – Recruitment Consultant (RA & CA)
Location: 1 Thai Ha Street, Dong Da District, Ha Noi, 45 Võ Thị Sáu Phường Đakao, Quận 1, TP. HCM
Job Description:
Job Background
We are currently hiring a Senior Recruitment Consultant who will take on a hybrid role involving both Recruitment Account Management (RA) and Career Advisory (CA) responsibilities. This role is ideal for someone with solid experience in headhunting, who enjoys working directly with clients and supporting candidates through every step of the recruitment process.

Job Description

1. Account Management (RA)
• Maintain and nurture existing client relationships, delivering outstanding customer service.
• Engage directly with Vietnamese clients to gather job details and match needs.
• Clarify job briefs to Career Advisory (CAs) and upload reviewed CVs.
• Coordinate all recruitment steps: interviews, offers, start dates, etc.
• Manage and negotiate recruitment service contracts.
• Expand client portfolio through networking and business development.

2. Career Advisory (CA)
• Analyze client job requirements and scope the candidate search.
• Source and screen candidates from job portals (LinkedIn, Facebook, Zalo).
• Manage job postings and expand candidate network.
• Conduct interviews and assess candidate competencies.
• Prepare candidates for interviews, negotiate offers, and guide through onboarding.
Job Requirements:
• 3–4 years professional experience, with 2–3 years recent recruitment/headhunting.
• Headhunt experience is a plus
• Strong communication and logical thinking.
• Intermediate English | OR Japanese proficiency.
• Strong communication & negotiation skills
• Deep understanding of talent sourcing
• Proficient in using recruitment tools & platforms
• Ability to assess candidate potential & cultural fit
• Target-driven & results-oriented

Role purpose

Business Unit description: Consumer Goods
Team fit : Marketing
Role purpose and responsibility:
• This role is responsible for leading and executing integrated marketing strategies to drive the growth of ANMUM and ETHICAL MARKETING of the adult nutrition portfolio, with a primary focus on the Total10, Heart Plus, new Innovation with targeted benefits.

• The Manager will lead and own healthcare professional engagements, strategic partnerships – with association and medical channels, and drive educational communication from HCP’s to consumers.

 Media & Content Strategy:
• Work closely with media/digital agencies and in-house teams to deliver high-performing omnichannel medical/HCP communication. Evaluate performance using a data-driven and test-learn-optimize mindset.
 Team & Cross-Functional Collaboration:
• Lead project teams & foster collaboration and strong stakeholder management with cross-functional units including Sales, RA, Supply Chain, and Global Brand teams.
• Support Marketing Director in coaching team members
 Compliance & Risk Management:
• Ensure all communication and innovation activities comply with local regulations, presence of scientific substantiation, and Fonterra governance standards.

Title: SEO Manager
Location: 189 - 197 Dương Bá Trạc, Phường Chánh Hưng, Quận 8, TP. HCM, 189 Dương Bá Trạc, phường 1, Quận 8, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
Job Description:
JOB BRIEF:
Maison RMI is bringing SEO in-house to build a long-term, sustainable growth engine rooted in modern best practices. As SEO Manager, you’ll lead the full spectrum of strategy and execution to grow organic revenue across maisononline.vn and partner brand platforms.

This role requires a data-driven, hands-on SEO leader with strong technical fundamentals and a future-facing mindset. You will work across departments and tools (Haravan, n8n, GA4, GenAI, etc.) to deliver results and lay the foundation for scalable automation and team growth.

Key responsibilities:
- Strategy & Governance
o Define a clear SEO roadmap aligned with business goals, product priorities, and cross-channel marketing plans
o Institutionalize clean, ethical SEO practices and create scalable playbooks for growth
o Set governance frameworks to ensure consistency and compliance with search engine guidelines
- Execution & Optimization
o Lead technical, on-page, and off-page SEO improvements across all eCommerce content
o Audit and enhance key site elements: architecture, crawl budget, indexation, speed, structured data
o Partner with vendors and internal teams (IT, Dev, UX) to implement technical fixes and platform changes (Haravan)
- AI & Automation Integration
o Build automated SEO workflows using no-code platforms (e.g. n8n, OpenAI)
o Optimize for discoverability in emerging search surfaces: AI-generated results, voice search, and structured snippets
o Explore scalable enrichment for product and category content through AI tools
- Performance Tracking
o Monitor and improve KPIs such as organic traffic, rankings, CTR, bounce rate, page speed, indexed content
o Collaborate with BI to build dashboards and reporting systems for weekly performance tracking
o Analyze changes in algorithm behavior, SERP shifts, and industry trends to stay ahead of the curve
- Team Leadership
o Mentor an SEO Executive (hiring in parallel), with potential to grow the SEO function into a full performance team
o Build training materials, SOPs, and onboarding for future hires and stakeholders
Job Requirements:
- At least 3 – 5+ years of hands-on SEO experience, ideally in an eCommerce or fashion/lifestyle retail environment
- Strong technical SEO understanding, including schema markup, structured data, canonical tags, and page speed optimization
- Proficient with SEO platforms and diagnostic tools: GA4, GSC, Semrush/Ahrefs, Looker Studio, etc.
- Working knowledge of frontend (HTML, CSS) for auditing purposes (no direct implementation required)
- Familiarity with or openness to learning GenAI content tools such as OpenAI and n8n
- Experience working with platforms like Haravan, Shopify, Magento, or similar
- Comfortable using dashboards and analytics to measure and communicate results
- Strong cross-functional communication and collaboration skills
- Fluent in both Vietnamese and English

Based on the basic philosophy “The customer first”, we are continuing our efforts to create malls that enhance the quality of life, stimulate local economic activity and contribute to community life and culture.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES OF THIS ROLE/岗位职责
1. Retail GTM (Go-To-Market) Management / 市场进入策略管理
• Materials, Gifts & Supplier Management: Oversee the end-to-end process of display materials and POSM (Point of Sale Materials), including planning, production, execution, inspection, and payment.
物料、礼品与供应商管理：负责陈列物料及 POSM（促销陈列物料）的全流程管理，包括计划、生产、执行、检查及付款。
• Gift Strategy Development: Align gift procurement, distribution, and payment plans with budget and business objectives.
礼品策略制定：根据预算及业务目标，制定礼品采购、分发及支付方案。
• Promotion Campaigns: Collaborate with Sales and Marketing teams to design, execute, and monitor offline promotional activities.
促销活动管理：与销售及市场团队协作，设计、执行并监控线下促销活动。
• New Product Launch Execution: Translate launch strategies into in-store promotional actions to support SO (Sell-Out) targets.
新品上市策略落地：将新品上市策略转化为终端零售活动及管理动作，助力新品销售目标达成。
• Retail Digitalization: Coordinate the digital tools aligned with GTM strategy to enhance retail insights and operational efficiency.
零售数字化管理：推动与 GTM 战略一致的数字工具应用，提升门店运营效率与数据洞察能力。
2. Store Management / 店铺管理
• Counter Construction & Supplier Relations: Optimize KA (Key Account) store layouts by increasing display tables and enhancing brand image/visual impact.
柜台建设与供应商关系维护：优化 KA（重点客户）门店陈列布局，增加展示桌数量，提升品牌形象及视觉效果。
• POSM Management: Roll out new promotional materials while maintaining existing ones; focus on TOP stores and TOP provinces to upgrade display surfaces, strengthen brand visibility, and expand shelf presence.
POSM 管理：推行新促销物料，维护现有物料；聚焦 TOP 门店及 TOP 省份，优化展示台面，强化品牌视觉，扩大陈列空间。
• Terminal Standardization: Implement image standards provided by marketing; ensure uniform terminal execution across stores.
终端标准化建设：根据市场部输出的形象标准，在终端进行统一规范执行，保障终端呈现一致性。
• Sample Unit Management: Oversee display/sample units and demo devices deployment at terminals.
样机管理：负责样机、展示装置等终端展示设备的管理与使用。
3. Sales & Inventory Management / 销售与库存管理
• Performance Analysis: Work with Field Force teams to evaluate channel-specific metrics (SI, ST, SO), conduct weekly SO reviews, and propose sales growth strategies.
销售分析：协同督导团队评估各渠道的 SI、ST、SO，每周复盘销售表现，提出增长策略。
• Competitor Monitoring: Analyze market competition, report insights to management, and develop tailored solutions.
竞品监测：分析市场竞争动态，向上级汇报并制定针对性解决方案。
• Inventory Optimization: Create stock coverage plans based on sales data to ensure optimal inventory levels.
库存优化：基于销售数据制定库存覆盖计划，确保合理库存水平。
• Category Structure Management: Focus on sell-out performance of structural products and category optimization.
产品结构管理：聚焦结构性产品的销售目标达成，提升品类结构与利润率。
4. Training & Technical Support / 培训与技术支持
• Product Knowledge Training: Conduct online/offline training sessions for store staff to ensure mastery of product features and updates.
产品知识培训：组织线上线下门店培训课程，确保团队掌握产品特性及更新内容。
• Sales Capability Enhancement: Empower sales team with localized speech scripts and selling techniques based on product positioning.
销售能力提升：结合产品定位，制定本地化话术及销售技巧，提升销售人员转化能力。
• Technical Assistance: Provide stores with product-specific guidance to enhance sales team expertise.
技术支持：为门店提供产品技术指导，提升销售团队专业能力。
• Evaluation System: Set up training evaluation and feedback mechanism to ensure quality improvement.
培训评估系统：建立培训评估与反馈机制，持续提升培训效果。
Job Requirements:
Education Requirement / 学历要求:
• Full-time Bachelor's degree or higher/大学毕业或以上学历
• Majored in: Business Administration, Economics, Marketing, Chinese, or related fields / 专业：工商管理、经济、市场营销、中文或相关专业
Working Requirement / 工作要求
1、5、Proficient in Chinese (Mandarin); English is a plus
中文流利，具备英语沟通能力者优先<ins>
2、At least 3–5 years of experience in retail management or related roles, preferably in the consumer electronics industry.
具备 3–5 年零售管理或相关岗位经验，有消费类电子产品行业经验者优先。
3、Deep understanding of retail marketing, visual merchandising, and retail operation processes
熟悉零售营销与视觉陈列原则，精通终端运营流程
4、 Experience in launching and managing retail promotions and PSI plans
有新品推广及销售-库存-进货计划（PSI）经验者优先
5、 Strong analytical skills, data-driven mindset, and problem-solving ability
具备较强的数据分析能力与解决问题的能力
6、Strong cross-functional collaboration skills, with experience working across departments
具备良好的跨部门协作经验
Keyword: Công Ty TNHH Công Nghệ Huawei Việt Nam

Title: Customs Brokerage Manager
Location: Bluesky Office Building, No. 01 Bach Dang, Ward 2, Tan Binh District, HCMC, Bluesky Office Building, No. 01 Bach Dang, Ward 2, Tan Binh District, HCMC
Job Description:
GEODIS is a Lead Logistics Provider who manages our customers’ supply chain by providing end-to-end solutions enabled by our infrastructure, our people, processes and systems. Since 2008, Geodis is a subsidiary entirely owned by the SNCF Group in French. Our mission is to help its clients succeed by overcoming logistical constraints thanks to its lines of business - Road Transport, Freight Forwarding, Contract Logistics, Supply Chain Optimization, Distribution & Express. It has revenues of EUR 6.8 billion and more than 30,000 employees working in 67 countries around the world.

For this position, you are accountable for:
1. P&L for customs department as yearly budget from company strategy
2. Country multimodal products and gateways relevance and smooth operation
3. Responsible of clients KPIs & service quality
4. Restructuring of customs team in order to develop more new products and productive organization
5. Supervising all the operational performance of Customs team.
6. Department compliance (process, legal, etc.)
7. Escalation of claims
Job Requirements:
• 5-7 years of experience in customs clearance – fashion and lifestyle are referred.
• Experience in working with Customs authority at ports / airports
• Experience with air freight, sea freight, trucking operation
• Background as 3PL is a plus
• Familiar with Cargo Wise 1 ( NextGen) is a plus
• Leadership skill, able to monitor, train, coach, measure the performance of the team
• Fluent spoke & written English
• Good Communication & Interpersonal skill
• Negotiation skill
• Analysis skill
• Quick minded
• Well organized

WHY JOIN US:
- Competitive salary + attractive bonus
- During 2 months probation time: 100% salary, Annual leave applied, BVI Health Insurance
- 13th month salary, Yearly performance bonus, Annual salary review
- Bonus for successfully referring new employees, Buddy program for Newcomers
- BVI Health Insurance, Annual health checks
- Full Social insurance, Health insurance and Unemployment insurance
- Internal & External Training courses
- Annual company trip, Gifts on special occasions
- 12 - 16 days off annual leave
- Professional global working environment.

Working place: Bluesky Office Building, No.1 Bach Dang, Ward 2, Tan Binh District, HCMC.

• Được đào tạo nâng cao kỹ năng chuyên môn và tham gia các hoạt động nội bộ đa dạng.

Title: Client Services Assistant for Australian Financial Advice Firm
Location: The Vista Building, 628C Vo Nguyen Giap Street, An Khanh Ward, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, The Vista building, No. 628C Vo Nguyen Giap Street, An Khanh Ward, Ho Chi Minh City
Job Description:
1. General information:
We are Ziku Capital from Australia. We specialize in financial consultancy with 3 main services: Financial Advice, Lending and Tax & Accounting. Ziku Global is one subsidiary in Vietnam with the same business and same vision.
We are a young and dynamic team of professionals committed to helping individuals, families and small business owners realize their financial dreams and life goals. We will achieve this through our unparalleled commitment to client service and ability to think laterally in order to provide the optimal financial solution. We are seeking some members to join our team and be part of our vision to be the valued lifelong partner that will enhance our clients' lifestyles.

2. Recruiting Positions:
- Client Services Officer (CSO) – 1 Person

3. Work location: Floor 3, The Vista building, No. 628C Vo Nguyen Giap Street, An Khanh Ward, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
4. Working time: from Monday to Friday.
5. Time to start: As soon as possible, to be discussed.

6. Job description (General):
- Ability to understand Financial Planning legislative & regulatory environment in Australia, including financial markets and how they work.
- Ability to understand what a Financial Advisor does and how we help our clients in Australia.
- Must have an excellent understand of English and be able to speak with a number of people including clients, team members and product providers in a highly fluent manner.
- Collaborating efficiently within your advice cluster to ensure clients are provided with the highest level of professional client / customer service and support while maintaining compliance and adherence to standards.
- ‍Clear communication and collaboration with the Advice Cluster Lead within the Advice division while actively contributing to the entire group business vision and mission statement.

7. Job description (Role Specific):
Initial / Further Advice Paperwork (SoA, RoA) & Ad-Hoc Form Completion
Tasks/ Responsibilities
- Capturing and recording key client information and data within SharePoint, Worksorted software & Adviser Portal systems
- New Client added in Worksorted / existing client personal details updated (if required) in Worksorted CRM
- Advice Process job established in Worksorted & relevant preliminary file notes related to job creation completed
- PEP Screening Process
- Ability to read & understand SoA advice recommendations & prepare all relevant paperwork & application forms
- Client Request / Ad-Hoc task job created & file notes completed confirming details of client request
- Email clients SoA confirmation of appointment details, Zoom / Teams link & all relevant documentation prior to SoA presentation (if applicable, virtual meeting etc)
- Developing and maintaining strong relationships with clients, third-party providers and dealing with client queries & responses
- Communicating effectively with members within the cluster team & broader Ziku Advice & Ziku Capital group
- Having regular awareness of activity levels across Advisers to assist Senior Associate with allocating and prioritizing key advice tasks such as balancing form preparation, lodgements / workflow implementation & follow ups: managing all parties’ expectations in the process
- Interactions with clients and other service providers are handled in a professional manner that leaves a positive and lasting impression.

Key Measures/Outcomes
- Checklist items updated in Advice Process job (in progress, completed etc).
- Third Party Authority (TPA) forms emailed to third party product providers & Certified ID
- Data Entry - XPLAN / Salesforce / Worksorted
- Confirmation of result confirming to proceed with providing designated service / KYC confirmation document uploaded to Worksorted CRM for substantiation (PEP Screening)
- SoA Paperwork / Application forms prepared & completed prior to SoA presentation meeting
- Clients, third-party providers and Ziku Capital team members provide feedback regarding their interactions and experience with you.
- Client paperwork & relevant documents & application forms are completed accurately, timely, and electronically stored for ease & convenience (QA completed by Senior Associate)
- Client feedback & testimonials sharing their experience with Ziku Capital
- Quality Assessment to be conducted by Senior Associate ensuring all compliance and professional standards effectively satisfied & consistently adhered to.
- Reporting of SoA / RoA Activity (Monday) in affiliation with Senior Associate

Advice Lodgement

Tasks/ Responsibilities
- Lodge relevant application forms & documents to proceed with advice implementation (document accordingly)
- Lodgements are handled in a timely, efficient, and compliant manner with completeness & accuracy
- Update relevant systems & adviser / product portals pertaining to lodgement of new / further advice (Salesforce / North etc)
- Developing and maintaining strong relationships with clients, third-party providers and dealing with client queries & responses
- Ability to think laterally & proactively with strong problem-solving capabilities

Key Measures/Outcomes
- Send client confirmation of next steps (advice lodgement summary)
- Worksorted - close advice process job & open Workflow Implementation Job & upload signed implementation documents & SoA ATP
- Lodgement notes effectively entered confirming details of Lodgement & stored under Applications tab in Worksorted CRM
- Lodgement Activity tracker effectively updated & completed regularly (Monday) – reporting purposes
- QA completed by Senior Associate on all lodgement via relevant adviser / product systems & portals (lodgement accuracy review)

Implementation Follow-Ups

Tasks/ Responsibilities
- Ensure all new business workflow items are followed up and completed within the agreed service standards.
- Provide all relevant implementation follow up documents (e.g. COF, Beneficiary forms, Investment Deposit Advice instructions etc)
- Client files and paperwork are completed accurately, timely and electronically stored for verification of implementation follow up
- Workflow follow up completed from start to finish until all implementation effectively satisfied with no further outstanding implementation items
- Update relevant systems & adviser / product portals pertaining to lodgement of new / further advice (Salesforce / North etc)
- Interactions with clients and other service providers are handled in a professional manner that leaves a positive and lasting impression
- Close out summary email to client confirming implementation effectively completed
- Worksorted update - close Workflow Job & update relevant sections (new AASA onboarded / review expiry date, frequency, AASA fee etc.

Key Measures/Outcomes
- Send client confirmation of next steps (advice implementation progress summary / update)
- Worksorted - updated Workflow Implementation Job & record detailed notes of follow ups made
- QA completed by Senior Associate all implementation on relevant advice / product systems & portals (implementation accuracy review)
- QA completed by Senior Associate reviewing workflow implementation job time stamp ‘open’ status to monitor efficiency of implementation follow up & accuracy of close out steps completed
- All relevant Worksorted CRM reporting for tracking and measuring purposes

Delivery against Annual Advice & Service Agreement (AASA) Requirements

Tasks/ Responsibilities
- Working within your cluster to ensure that the business adheres to AASA requirements.
Specifically:
- Preparation of all Progress Update Meeting documents in advance of scheduled client meeting, such as the following:
 AASA
 Fee alteration forms
 CAF (if required)
 Client portfolio reports / Certificate of Currency (CoC
 Ad-hoc client requests & associated paperwork

- PEP Screening Process
- AASA issued, retrieved, and recorded within the required timeframes on Worksorted CRM, SharePoint & Salesforce/ FFS System
- Any AASAs that require being turned off / terminated to be done so within the required timeframes & documented for confirmation
- All AASA client data is accurately reflected and up to date in Worksorted CRM, including resetting review job & updated AASA expiry date etc
- All AASA client data is accurately reflected on Salesforce / FFS system, including service fulfilment tagged as completed
- Clear & adequate documentation of all relevant details and discussions captured during review meeting in line with AASA (e.g., file notes in review job to track progress of review steps).

Key Measures/Outcomes
- Progress Update Meetings are held within the 12-month period unless extension specified otherwise by the client
- Entitled clients receive automated review offers via email & SMS in line with AAA expiry date on Worksorted CRM – track progress of offers / responses to schedule review meeting on behalf of Adviser (Calendly & Worksorted CRM to be used & updated for measuring & tracking purposes)
- Clients are booked in for their review in accordance with the Advice Documentation licensee policy (QAF)
- All review meeting interactions are file noted and checklist items updated to track progress throughout review steps
- updated and uploaded in the CRM
- Client Existing AASA details & current policies & products recorded in Client Review Meeting File Note (Review Checklist) & included within review pack documents prior to scheduled review
- Confirmation of result confirming to proceed with providing designated service / KYC confirmation document uploaded to Worksorted CRM for substantiation (PEP Screening)
- The required AASA & fee alteration forms are issued timely to AASA clients within the relevant timeframes / extension granted & documented
- All AASA notices are issued in a timely manner and in accordance with the policy and procedure and stored on the Worksorted CRM
- All AASA clients are contacted prior to their Annual Advice Service Agreement expiry date to discuss entering into / renewing their AASA
- All AASA documentation and correspondence is stored on Worksorted CRM & review job (client review meeting file note / review checklist & Appendices uploaded for delivery of service entitlement substantiation)
- Satisfactory completion & adherence to all record keeping obligations, such as the successful completion of the Client Review Meeting File Note document, detailing review meeting discussions held & outcome following review meeting
- Senior Associate immediately notified of any AASAs not returned within the required timeframe & follow up actions required (Self-report Issue Notification Form)
- AASA data keyed into Worksorted CRM & updated in Salesforce / FFS team (Senior Associate QA spot check for accuracy)
- AASA data is regularly updated promptly & proactively with accuracy and attention to detail on Worksorted CRM
- Any data errors identified are rectified immediately
- AASA documents are stored on Worksorted CRM & service entitlements & fee details accurately recorded
- Yearly review conducted within required AASA timeframe / self-report Issue Notification Form if non-delivery
- Salesforce is updated accordingly in relation to AASA service entitlement fulfilment & fee agreement
- Quality Assessment to be conducted by Senior Associate ensuring all compliance and professional standards effectively satisfied & consistently adhered to.

8. Benefits:
- Get proper training for all work.
- Work in a comfortable and dynamic environment.
- Have the opportunity to advance at work and participate in professional development classes.
- Lunch allowance 600,000 VND/month.
- Holidays: follow Vietnamese calendar and get some more extra holidays follow Australian calendar.
- Private health insurance when continue working after the 1st year contract.
- Enjoy competitive compensation and benefits packages, ongoing opportunities for growth and development, and a supportive and collaborative work environment. Salary is negotiable according to ability and experience (gross salary range: 10-15M.VND).
- Join a team that values innovation, dedication, and client satisfaction.
- The 13rd month salary and bonus based on performance.
- Exchange reward trip based on performance.
- Experience the satisfaction of helping individuals & families achieve their financial & life goals.
- Be part of a company that is committed to excellence and is always looking for ways to improve.

09. Record requirement:
- For recruitment: Cover letter, resume, CV clearly stating the work and study process.
- After recruitment, before onboard: Copies citizen identification card, criminal check/ police check, resume with working and residence history from age of 16.
Job Requirements:
Job Requirements:
- Graduated from University majoring in Business Administration, Bachelor of Business Administration, Commerce, Banking & Finance or related fields.
- Have at least 1 year of experience in a similar role.
- Agile, hardworking, eager to learn, with a high sense of responsibility, honesty.
- Proficient in office skills, Microsoft 365.
- English skills: writing, reading & understanding, advanced communication skills are required.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Excellent attention to detail and accuracy.
- Good communication, interpersonal, and relationship-building skills.
- Strong knowledge of business administration principles, standards, and regulations.
- Detail-oriented, good time-management, and organizational skills.
- Ability to multitask and work in a fast-paced environment.
- Having previous experience in working with Australian Financial Planning laws would be highly advantaged.

Title: Chuyên Viên/ Chuyên Viên Cao Cấp Tái Thẩm Định Khách Hàng Doanh Nghiệp
Company: Ngân Hàng TMCP Phát Triển TP.HCM (HDBank)
Location: Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Toà nhà HD - 25Bis Nguyễn Thị Minh Khai, Phường Sài Gòn, TP. HCM
Job Description:
- Phân tích nội dung đề xuất cấp tín dụng của ĐVKD, lập Báo cáo Tái thẩm định đưa ra nhận xét đề xuất độc lập trong việc cấp tín dụng cho các khách hàng doanh nghiệp.

Title: Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist
Location: 1 Thai Ha Street, Trung Liet Ward, Dong Da District, Hanoi, Vietnam, Brighton Investments Joint Stock Company
Job Description:
ABOUT US:
Brighton Investments (BI) is dedicated to managing a portfolio of innovative, forward-thinking companies across various industries, all unified by a mission to Enrich Vietnamese people’s lives with Knowledge, Trust, and Finest Experience. We envision a brighter future by unlocking boundless potential and transforming lives, empowering our teams and communities to reach new heights. At Brighton, we foster a collaborative and agile culture that values not only speed and responsiveness but also an uncompromising commitment to quality and excellence. We believe in delivering high-impact results without compromising on standards, creating a workplace where agility and thoroughness go hand-in-hand.

Our Values and Culture:

Core Values:
Integrity: Be real and act right, even when it’s hard or no one is watching
Excellence: Good is not enough. Never settle for mediocrity
Innovation: Embrace the new. Challenge the known. Break the boundaries. And redefine possibilities
Collaboration: Unity births the best ideas
Impact: Choose wisely, act decisively and leave profound footprints

Cultural Foundations:

Discipline in execution
Agility in response
Productivity in delivery
Collaboration cross-business
Can-do attitude
Self-starter mindset

YOUR MISSION:
As our Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist at Brighton’s HR Shared Services, you'll be the architect of talent experiences across our diverse portfolio companies and play a key role in attracting and selecting the people who shape the future of our group. Your mission is to connect exceptional individuals with meaningful opportunities, ensuring every hire strengthens our teams and advances our collective impact.
You'll work as a trusted partner to leaders across different industries, understanding their unique challenges and finding people who don't just fill roles, but elevate entire teams. This isn't traditional recruiting—it's talent partnership that creates lasting value for both candidates and our organizations.
We’re not just hiring a recruiter. We’re looking for someone who finds fulfilment in guiding the right people into the right opportunities and matching the right people with the right challenges – someone who listens before suggesting, who observes carefully and acts with intention. In this role, recruitment is not just about closing jobs, it’s about quietly shaping the growth of both teams and individuals.
WHAT YOU’LL DO (AND DO WELL):
1. Strategic Contribution & Collaboration:
• Recruitment Strategy: Support the execution of talent acquisition strategies that align with business growth plans and brand positioning goals
• Workforce Planning Partnership: Collaborate with HR team and BU leaders to forecast hiring needs, identify critical roles and develop proactive sourcing strategies
• Market Intelligence: Conduct talent market analysis, salary benchmarking, and market player intelligence to inform recruitment strategies and employer positioning
• Pipeline Management: Build and maintain robust talent pipelines for key positions, reducing time-to-fill and ensuring business continuity
• Succession Planning Support: Identify and develop internal talent mobility programmes while building external succession candidate pools
• Support employer branding efforts that authentically represent our culture and opportunities

2. Talent Acquisition Execution:
• End-to-End Recruitment: Manage the full-cycle hiring process for assigned roles: from intake and sourcing to interviews, offers, and onboarding coordination.
• Sourcing: Source and engage high-quality candidates through multiple channels, with emphasis on building relationships with passive talent who align with our values
• Stakeholder Partnership: Collaborate with HR partners and hiring managers across portfolio companies to deeply understand role requirements, team dynamics, success criteria, timelines, and other expectations.
• Candidate Experience Design: Create exceptional candidate experiences that reinforce our brand values and attract top talent
• Interview Process Optimization: Design and facilitate structured interview processes, training hiring managers on best practices and bias mitigation
• Offer Management: Lead salary negotiations, reference checks, and offer closure with focus on acceptance rate optimization

3. Sourcing Innovation & Employer Branding:
• Multi-Channel Sourcing: Leverage diverse sourcing channels including social media, professional networks, employee referrals, and industry events
• Digital Recruitment: Utilize cutting-edge recruitment technologies, ATS optimization, and data analytics to enhance sourcing effectiveness
• Employer Brand Advocacy: Partner with Culture & Engagement team to develop compelling employer value propositions and recruitment marketing materials
• Network Development: Build and maintain extensive professional networks within retail, premium brands, and related industries
• Campus & Graduate Programs: Develop relationships with top universities and design graduate recruitment programs

4. Process Excellence & Analytics:
• Data-Driven Insights: Track and analyze recruitment metrics (time-to-fill, cost-per-hire, quality-of-hire, source effectiveness) to optimize processes
• Compliance Management: Ensure all recruitment activities comply with Vietnamese labor laws and company policies
• Vendor Management: Manage relationships with recruitment agencies, job boards, and other talent acquisition vendors
• Process Standardization: Develop and maintain standardized recruitment processes across all business units while allowing for role-specific adaptations
• Knowledge Sharing: Document best practices and provide training to BU HR teams on recruitment excellence
Job Requirements:
WHAT WE ARE LOOKING FOR:
Education & Experience:
• Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business, Psychology, or related field
• 5-8 years of progressive talent acquisition experience with demonstrated success in sourcing and placing quality candidates
• Multi-industry exposure preferred — experience working across different business sectors or strong adaptability to learn new domains
• Shared services or multi-client experience valued but not required
• Track record of building relationships with both candidates and hiring stakeholders.
Skills & Competencies:
• Advanced sourcing capabilities: Proficiency with LinkedIn Recruiter, Boolean search techniques, and creative candidate identification methods
• Assessment and interviewing skills: Ability to evaluate both technical competencies and cultural fit through structured conversations
• Stakeholder management: Experience working with diverse personalities and managing competing priorities across multiple internal clients
• Data analysis and reporting: Comfortable with recruitment metrics, trend analysis, and presenting insights to leadership
• Technology proficiency: Experience with ATS systems, recruitment platforms, and productivity tools
• Communication excellence: Strong written and verbal skills in Vietnamese and English for diverse candidate interactions
• Strong organizational and time management abilities
Personal Attributes:
• Genuine curiosity about people: Natural interest in understanding what motivates individuals and how they make career decisions
• Quality-focused mindset: Preference for finding the right person rather than rushing to fill positions
• Collaborative spirit: Enjoys working across teams and building consensus among different stakeholders
• Growth orientation: Seeks opportunities to expand skills and take on new challenges
• Resilient and adaptable: Comfortable with ambiguity and able to thrive in a fast-paced, evolving environment
• Integrity-driven: Committed to honest, transparent communication with all parties throughout the recruitment process
WHO WILL SUCCEED:
You will thrive in this role if you are:
• The Relationship Builder: You naturally connect with people and maintain long-term professional relationships. Candidates remember you positively even when they don't get the job, and hiring managers trust your judgment because you consistently deliver quality matches
• The Strategic Thinker: You see beyond immediate hiring needs to understand broader team dynamics and organizational goals. You ask thoughtful questions that help hiring managers clarify what they really need, and you provide market insights that influence strategic decision
• The Quality Advocate: You believe that great hiring is worth the extra effort. You're willing to expand search parameters, try new sourcing approaches, or have difficult conversations to ensure the right cultural and technical fit
• The Continuous Learner: You stay curious about new industries, recruitment technologies, and best practices. You're excited by the opportunity to work across different business sectors and see each new hiring challenge as a chance to grow your expertise.
• The Cultural Ambassador: You understand that you're often the first impression candidates have of our organization. You take pride in representing our values authentically and creating experiences that reflect our commitment to excellence and respect for individuals.
• The Problem Solver: When traditional sourcing methods aren't working, you get creative. When hiring managers have unrealistic expectations, you provide constructive guidance. When candidates have concerns, you address them thoughtfully and honestly.
• The Impact Creator: You measure success not just by placements made, but by the long-term success of your hires and the positive experiences you create. You understand that great recruitment work has lasting effects on people's careers and organizational success

Market Analysis

Product and Solution Development

• Excellent influencing and stakeholder management skills.
• Pro-active, self-motivated, high learning agility, creative, passion of business, capable organization
• Excellent customer service skills.

Title: Kỹ Sư Kiểm Thử Tự Động (Automation Testing Engineer)
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Chứng Khoán SSI
Location: số 1 Phố Lương Yên, Bạch Đằng, Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, 1C Ngô Quyền - Hoàn Kiếm - Hà Nội
Job Description:
1. Thực hiện tự động hóa kịch bản kiểm thử nhằm nâng cao chất lượng và giảm thời gian phát triển sản phẩm dịch vụ CNTT
• Chuyển kịch bản kiểm thử (manual script) sang kịch bản tự động (automation script)
• Xác định mức độ hiệu quả của các kịch bản tự động có thể thay thế kịch bản kiểm thử
• Xây dựng, quản trị các kịch bản kiểm thử nhằm đảm bảo các dịch bản kiểm thử có thể “tái sử dụng”
• Thiết kế định dạng và lập báo cáo kết quả của mỗi trường hợp kiểm thử trong hệ thống tự động hóa
• Xác định nguồn và nơi chứa các dữ liệu kiểm thử (test data)
2. Thực hiện kiểm thử hiệu năng, tải nhằm đảm bảo khả năng mở rộng của hệ thống, sản phẩm dịch vụ CNTT
• Phân tích yêu cầu và hệ thống kiến trúc ứng dụng sản phẩm dịch vụ CNTT, lập các kịch bản kiểm thử hiệu năng, tải của hệ thống
• Thực hiện kịch bản kiểm thử hiệu năng, tải và báo cáo kết quả; Kèm các khuyến nghị để cải thiện
• Thực hiện kịch bản scale-out của hệ thống, nhằm đảm bảo hệ thống ổn định khi quá tải
3. Xây dựng và quản trị chiến lược kiểm thử tự động nhằm tối ưu và tăng lợi ích của tự động hóa trong sản phẩm dịch vụ CNTT
• Xây dựng, thực thi và quản trị chiến lược kiểm thử tự động
• Thiết kế và hoàn thành các cải tiến hiệu năng của kiểm thử tự động
• Xác định và xử lý ràng buộc giữa trường hợp kiểm thử
4. Thực hiện các công việc khác theo phân công trong Bộ phận
• Xây dựng tài liệu hướng dẫn kỹ thuật và vận hành cho kiểm thử viên để thực hiện kiểm thử tự động cho mỗi trường hợp kiểm thử
• Đề xuất xây dựng, cải tiến và thực hiện xây dựng quy trình Kiểm thử Tự động theo phân công
• Thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự phân công của Trưởng bộ phận
Job Requirements:
• Tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm trong kiểm thử tự động Web UI, API testing, Mobile testing.
• Có kinh nghiệm về Java và một trong các ngôn ngữ lập trình (C#, Python, Javascript)
• Kinh nghiệm chuyên sâu một trong các khung kiểm thử tự động (Selenium, Cucumber, Appium, Protractor, Cypress, Robot, ...)
• Làm việc trong môi trường Agile với phương pháp tiếp cận BDD và hỗ trợ lập trình viên trong việc đảm bảo chất lượng sớm.
• Có kinh nghiệm tốt với API testing (Postman, RestAssured) và contract-based testing (ví dụ, PACT)
• Có hiểu biết vững chắc về các phương pháp kiểm thử, bao gồm các mức kiểm thử, kiểm thử tĩnh và kiểm thử động
• Có kỹ năng nghiên cứu, học hỏi và vận dụng công nghệ mới vào công việc
• Có kỹ năng giao tiếp, trình bày tốt
• Có khả năng làm việc độc lập, chịu áp lực tốt.

Title: Logistic Supervisor
Location: 5B Ton Duc Thang Street, Bến Nghé, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, District 1
Job Description:
1. Job Overview:

The logistics division members will play a key role in supporting the efficient planning, coordination, and execution of logistics operations. Working closely with all stakeholders, this position involves overseeing various aspects of the supply chain, including transportation and distribution. The successful candidate will contribute to optimizing processes, ensuring timely delivery of products, lead to improved warehouse operation, alerting stores before error occurs and maintaining high standards of quality and accuracy within the logistics function, maximize efficiency through smooth communication with suppliers.

2. Scope of work and responsibilities:

- Manage warehouse operation
Checking daily progress of receiving/labeling work for warehouse shipping (DC/EC), VAS work, and inventory management.
Visiting DC to patrol the situation and staff to improve.
- Manage store delivery
Monitoring the process of delivery. Checking stores’ situation.
- Establish and standardize work procedures and manuals for logistics.
- Improve logistics cost.
Making KPI and creating regular reports on inbound and outbound shipments.
- Respond to problems such as emergency shipment / warehouse delivery / warehouse work operational errors, inventory discrepancies, and shipping delays, and issuing instructions for corrective measures.
- Lead member and supplier
With the goal of maximizing logistics operation efficiency and minimizing costs, lead toward a goal and maximize the abilities and experience of team members to achieve high performance. Educating related division members to improve supply chain.
Job Requirements:
- Utilize internal and external networks to collect effective information for work.
- Ability to deal with unexpected matters flexibly and make consistent decisions.
- Leading other company members.
- Listening and empathy for smooth communication.

Title: Retail Merchandiser - Houseware
Location: 5B Ton Duc Thang Street, Bến Nghé, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, District 1
Job Description:
1. Job Overview:

In normal circumstances: The most important thing is management of product supply, product information and product planning.
Steadily execute instructions and translations from the responsible MD, and complete work by the due date.
Understand how to register the MD system.
Confirm product delivery plans linked to RKJ and complete in-store sales without delay.
Collect market information constantly and report to MD.
Hold regular product training to improve store staff knowledge.

2. Scope of work and responsibilities:

1. MANAGEMENT/SALES PLAN SHEET: Understand new and old product revisions and establish an appropriate sales plan. Understand whether there are regulations and make an appropriate sales plan.
2. MANAGEMENT/ORDER MEETING: In-house adjustments can be made by the deadline, and registration can be completed without omission.
3. MANAGEMENT/PURCHASE ORDER/RKJ: Contact the product department and work on clearing regulated product tests.
4. MANAGEMENT/MASTER MANAGEMENT (LABEL/ITEM/PRICE): In conjunction with a consulting company, you can check the UPDATE of regulatory information and collect and visualize accurate information.
5. MANAGEMENT/BUSINESS CONTACT: Understand business communication and e-mail instructions from RKJ correctly and respond optimally.
6. MANAGEMENT/LOCAL MD: Conduct planning and commercialization of Vietnamese local products.
7. MANAGEMENT/PURCHASE ORDER/DOMESTIC: We communicate production adjustments for domestic sales factories and understand operations without delay from order placement to warehouse delivery.
8. MANAGEMENT/WORKSHOP: Once a half year, you can plan and carry out Workshop / Installation
using OPENMUJI space.
9. MANAGEMENT/HUMAN RESOURCE DEVELOPMENT: Can create and execute educational schedules for human resource development.
10. SALES/SALES PROMOTION PLAN (SALES/PRICE): For the department / department in charge, finalize the target product and estimate the planned quantity.
11. SALES/PRODUCT BASIC INFORMATION: Create product basic information for more than 10 items in half a year and hold staff briefing sessions.
12. SALES/PRODUT AND SALES MTG: Weekly instruction draft can be created for the following items
①Sales place ②Sales ③Inventory ④Sales Promotion ⑤operation
13. SALES/SALES PROMOTION TOOL: You can create a sales floor face table and make suggestions / instructions to the sales department.
Checking the sales floor status of the responsible depa every day.
Job Requirements:
Ability, knowledge and skills required for work:

・ Utilize internal and external networks to collect effective information for work.
・ Can deal with unexpected matters flexibly and make consistent decisions.
・ Listening and empathy for smooth communication.
・ Ability to grasp things from various aspects, anticipate situations and act.
・ Data analysis using Excel (Excel skills).
・ Language skills (TOEIC 650 or higher).
・ Understand the direction of the company as a whole and drop it into the department.
・ Communicate with related departments and report to other departments and managers.
・ Understand departmental policies and support capabilities that Manager can execute.
・ Understand operations related to products from upstream to downstream.

Experience:

・ Merchandising experience
・ More than 2 years of experience using Excel / Word / PowerPoint
・ At least one year of practical experience as an MDA or equivalent or more

Title: Security, Safety & Operational Resilience Manager
Location: Tầng 18, Toà nhà Charmvit Tower, số 117 đường Trần Duy Hưng, P. Trung Hoà, Q. Cầu Giấy, Hà, 11th Floor, ETOWN 2, 364 Cong Hoa, Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City
Job Description:
1. Overall Job Purpose
• Ensure that DHL is the benchmark for security, business continuity and occupational health and safety excellence in the logistics industry.
• Initiate, co-ordinate and implement programs/ investigations into losses, other security incidents relating to DHL assets, personnel and shipments carried by DHL.
• Develop, implement and monitor policies, procedures on security, business continuity management (BCM), occupational health & safety (H&S) standards & practices to safeguard DHL employees and customers’ shipments, DHL assets

2. Main Accountabilities
2.1. Internal
Branch Management
• Advise branch management of any changes and recommended counter measures
• Provide support and advice on security, BCM, H&S matters
• Advise on any security, BCM, occupational health & safety related changes and recommend security, occupational health & safety practices to ensure policies and business needs are met to specifications
• Conduct security, BCM, H&S audits (and assist other audit teams e.g. TSP), both proactively and reactively to assess the effectiveness of security, occupational health & safety practices and procedures at branch sites.
• Conduct Security & Safety related investigations, analysis and other enquiries as required.
• Role of Branch BCM coordinator

Security, BCM & Occupational Health & Safety related Networking
• Developed extensive contacts with Security personnel and Occupational Health & Safety Practitioners in a variety of industries, including the airfreight /airline industry as well as local law enforcement and regulatory agencies
• Develop and maintain extensive internal contacts within DHL as security of the shipment in DHL custody is an end-to-end process

Law Enforcement, Security Officials, Local Authorities & Regulatory Bodies, Security Consultants, Private Investigators
• Follow and update Legal and regulation related to security, OHS & BCM in a timely manner and best practice developments.
• Establish professional liaison to ensure strong links are maintained between DHL and such authorities

All DHL country Staff
• Enlist the support of all DHL staff to ensure that DHL’s environment is safe, secured and compliant to occupational health & safety standards
• Conduct regular security, OHS & BCM training to employees

Occupational Health & Safety Managers at other DHL locations
• Liaise closely to ensure a cohesive and effective compliance to DPDHL regional/global occupational health & safety manual and standards.

Country Office
• Provide regular updates on Security, BCM and H&S issues
• Ensure compliance to DHL Security, BCM and H&S policies and procedures

2.2. External
DHL Customers
• Provide professional security, safety and BCM support

Security Vendors, Security Consultants, Private investigators
• Source appropriate security vendors and consultants with respect to the purchase of security equipment, undertaking of investigations, etc.
• Co-ordinate country security, BCM, occupational health and safety activities and ensure compliance of DHL sub-contractors with security procedures as specified in the Regional Security Policy and Procedures Manual and Occupational Health & Safety Standards.
• Monitor and audit the security services provided
• Conduct regular security, OHS & BCM training to vendors
Job Requirements:
• Minimum 2-3 years of relevant experience in security, safety at multinational company
• ISO 45001, CTPAT, TAPA & BCM knowledge preferable.
• Advantage for those with experiences in handling high value cargo
• Excellent software skills
• Analytical thinking and systematic problem solving
• Strong inter-personal and communication skills
• Good negotiating skill

Title: Accountant Payable - Working Location: Thu Duc, HCM
Location: Saigon Hi-Tech Park • Lot E2b-3, Street D6, Tan Phu Ward, Thu Duc City, Ho Chi Minh City, Saigon Hi-Tech Park • Lot E2b-3, Street D6, Tan Phu Ward, Thu Duc City, Ho Chi Minh City
Job Description:
Take responsibility in assigned legal entities regarding accounting payable.
1/ Account Payable
Record expenses when incurred.
Process payments to third parties in time. Zero intercompany overdues. No backlog in handling invoices.
Secure insurance premium invoices are paid on time.

Pay attention to book correctly some AP invoices to Inventory account.
Assign Tax codes for the Purchases correctly.
Propose payment plan timely and accurately for review.
Submit payment plan on or before Tuesday of 2nd week and 4th week every month.

Reconcile Payments between Bank & Accounting system and submit to direct superior/FMs on or before WD+2.
Ensure all payments made are supported by qualified documents.
Proactively handle inquiries related to payments
2/ Month end closing support
Complete AP journal entries by WD1
Prepare AP month end reconciliation file and submit for review before WD+ 3
3/ Integration process
Experience in taking over new acquisition subsidiaries
Willingness attitude and support Finance Manager during integration process
4/ Other duties are assigned by manager.

At least 2 to 3 - year experience in accountant payable
Bachelor in Finance/ Accounting or related field
Good speaking and writing in English
Good at Microsoft Office, especially Excel

Title: BOM Purchaser
Location: Factory 5, Lot CN-01, Dong Mai Industrial Park, Dong Mai Ward, Quang Yen Town, Quang Ninh Province, Vietnam, Hai Phong, Vietnam, Hải Dương, Hai Duong, Vietnam, Factory 5, Lot CN-01, Dong Mai Industrial Park, Dong Mai Ward, Quang Yen Town, Quang Ninh Province, Vietnam
Job Description:
Job Scope—Operation Purchasing:

1. Ensure on-time material availability for production.
2. Manage Purchase Orders to Suppliers, orders rescheduling and expediting.
3. Resolve purchasing issues
4. Invoice correctly and timely

Tasks：
1. Release and follow-up Purchase Orders to suppliers.
2. Follow-up NCR, OOR, non-binding forecast to suppliers.
3. Ensure supplier’s compliance to VDL’s rules & requirements.
4. Drives supplier’s KPIs and QLTC performance improvement.
5. Contributes in sourcing, cost reduction, purchasing improvement initiatives and company improvement projects.
6. Follow up on ECO and company policies to suppliers.
7. Follow-up on orders rescheduling and expediting.
8. Follow-up on loading ramp-up and ramp-down situation.
9. Contributes in inventory control program.
10. Maintain Purchasing database (NDA, KPI report, Contracts etc.)
11. Comply with Purchasing SOP.
12. Support Finance Department to solve discrepancy issues between supplier invoice or delivery order with actual receipt.
13. Fulfill the requirements for any related works assigned by company.


Job Scope—Initial Purchasing:

1. To source for the most competitive supply and purchasing deal for new parts, material and services globally, especially develop the Vietnam’s supply database
2. Initiate and Manage Global Purchasing Agreement
3. Manage supplier relationship and supplier performance on commodity management approach.
4. Manage on-going cost reduction and shorten Leadtime program, track supplier capacity, technological and supply chain trend.
5. Drive Localization leader from inside, active in localization from outside
6. Develop & Build up suppliers relationship, generate the suppliers’ strategy


Tasks:

1. Develop sourcing strategy globally to get the most competitive source and purchasing deal in term of price, lead-time, quality and service level.
2. Finish RFQ timely
3. Negotiate contract and price for existing parts, materials and services to ensure the lowest possible cost of ownership and/or to meet cost targets established by management.
4. Spearhead commodity management， tapping on a global network and leveraging on ETG group purchasing power and experience.
5. Identify and develop new supplier both locally and regionally to enlarge and optimize the supply base.
6. Drive purchasing process improvement including developing strategies to ensure smooth supply flow to meet ramp-up and ramp-down situation. Develop techniques and strategies to address short-term global material shortage.
7. Support operational buyer team to expedite and resolve lead time or any purchasing issues.
8. Track and monitor supplier capacity and technology development. Work with suppliers to obtain their technological & capacity roadmap for our supply chain planning.
9. Manage supplier KPI and relationship using appropriate performance measurement and communication tool. Drives Monthly/Quarterly Supplier Performance Review.
10. Provides monthly management summary of Key Supplier Performance including corrective actions to improve the overall performance.
11. Drive purchasing cost reduction program through appropriate program such as price negotiation, contract agreement, value engineering, reverse engineering, material substitution, consolidation buy, process improvement and any supply chain innovation.
12. Drive competitive supplier payment terms and support supplier payment issues with Finance and Administration department, where applicable.
13. Track commodity market trend and latest technological processes. Provide inputs to management during the development of overall supply chain strategies.
14. Maintain purchasing data base and Purchasing SOP.
15. Fulfill the requirements for any related works assigned by company.
Job Requirements:
Education:
- Bachelor’s Degree or above required

Technical Profile:
- Technical background preferred
- Global Sourcing & procurement Knowledge
- Know well of technical drawing for outsourcing

Preference:

- Familiar with the supply base of Vietnam
- Customer Focus
- Flexibility and be able to work in high-pressure environment
- Tenacious commitment to continuous improvement
- Passionate and result-focus self-starter , creative thinker and innovator with can-do attitude
- Strong sense of urgency, collaborative team style, and ability to quickly adapt to change in priorities

Critical Competences:

- 10+ years knowledge of global supply base and strong supplier development experience (including USA and Europe Supply Base)
- 5+ years working experience in multinational company/ CM equipment manufacturing environment is plus
- Experienced in developing strategies, concepts and insights from market data and in-depth intelligence in support of strategic or purchasing decision marking
- Experience in machinery procurement and project handover from parent company
- Experience in mechanical machining

Communication Profile:

- Strong oral and written communication skills with fluency in English (ability to communicate fluently with international stakeholders)
- Oral communication skill in Chinese and Vietnamese is preferred
- Exception communication and interpersonal skills to thrive in collaborative, global, and cross-functional environment

Managerial Profile:
- 5+ years supervisor or management experience is plus

Computer Literate:
- Familiar with Microsoft Office: PowerPoint, Excel, Word, Project
- ERP- Key user experience with global ERP-system
